description.narrative: Emergency project to help India's struggling COVID response. The proposed project aims to support both Government health facilities in unreachable rural areas in improving the vaccination programme and  sensitise the community to access the Government service. The project will be implemented in association with the Government Health staff, frontline health workers, social change makers and the common people in the communities

title.narrative: 120 Change agents and 40 volunteers sensitise the people to abstain from myths and misbeliefs on vaccine, get registered for vaccination programme and get the two doses of vaccine on scheduled interval

description.narrative: 120 Change agents and 40 volunteers sensitise the people to abstain from myths and misbeliefs on vaccine, get registered for vaccination programme and get the two doses of vaccine on scheduled interval

title.narrative: # of people sensitised by the change agents and the volunteers

description.narrative: # of people sensitised by the change agents and the volunteers

comment.narrative: Due to delay in project approval, activities not started in June. Only follow-up activity cost incurred.;

With increased number of locations, through small group meetings at villages instead of centralized meeting at Panchayats more number of people reached out through awareness raising campaigns. As we procured the materials centrally instead of at different field locations the cost for the materials reduced. Also the training for all locations organised virtually which resulted no budget utilisation.;

title.narrative: 480 ASHA and ICDS workers are trained on mythbusting and building confidence in vaccination for COVID among the people.

description.narrative: 480 ASHA and ICDS workers are trained on mythbusting and building confidence in vaccination for COVID among the people.

title.narrative: # of ASHA and ICDS workers trained

description.narrative: # of ASHA and ICDS workers trained

comment.narrative: Due to delay in project approval, activities not started in June. Only follow-up activity cost incurred.;

With increased number of locations and covering frontline health workers from adjacent locations of operational panchayats we reached out to more number of frontline health workers. As many of the training conducted virtually and the travel cost for frontline health workers in many locations covered by the Government department less cost incurred. Also for development of training module no cost incurred as we used already developed module by the Government.;

title.narrative: ASHA and ICDS workers equipped with personal protective equipment to assist the health department staff in organising vaccination camps

description.narrative: ASHA and ICDS workers equipped with personal protective equipment to assist the health department staff in organising vaccination camps

title.narrative: # of ASHA and ICDS workers equipped with PPE kits

description.narrative: # of ASHA and ICDS workers equipped with PPE kits

comment.narrative: Due to delay in project approval, activities not started in June. Only follow-up activity cost incurred.;

With increased locations more number of frontline health workers supported. However as the materials procured centrally instead of field locations the cost was reduced significantly. Hence less budget utilisation in comparison to target achieved.;

title.narrative: The communities are made aware of through IECs and awareness raising campaigns on importance of vaccine to save their lives and not to trust on mis information around the vaccines

description.narrative: The communities are made aware of through IECs and awareness raising campaigns on importance of vaccine to save their lives and not to trust on mis information around the vaccines

description.narrative: # of people reached through awareness raising campaigns on vaccination

comment.narrative: Due to delay in project approval, activities not started in June. Only follow-up activity cost incurred.;

With increased number of locations, through small group meetings at villages instead of centralized meeting at Panchayats more number of people reached out through awareness raising campaigns. As we procured the materials centrally instead of at different field locations the cost for the materials reduced.;

title.narrative: The doctors, nurses and other paramedics in the health centers/ facilities are equipped with personal protective equipment.

description.narrative: The doctors, nurses and other paramedics in the health centers/ facilities are equipped with personal protective equipment.

title.narrative: # of health staff equipped with PPE

description.narrative: # of health staff equipped with PPE

comment.narrative: As per Government health department request and keeping in view of urgent need more number of health centers covered thereby reaching out to more health center staff. Accordingly, a higher budget utilised.;
Due to delay in approval, the procurement not initiated. Only follow-up activities cost booked.;

title.narrative: The health centre staff have transport and essential logistic support enabling them reach out to remote locations for administering the vaccine to people

description.narrative: The health centre staff have transport and essential logistic support enabling them reach out to remote locations for administering the vaccine to people

comment.narrative: As per planning no cost incurred for output delivery. Only follow-up cost booked.;

In line with Government's vaccination schedule more number of vaccination camps organised, in line with increased locations we reached out to support more health staff. Accordingly higher budget utilised.;

title.narrative: The health centres/facilities have an adequate number of thermocol boxes, syringes and other equipment to carry and administer the vaccine to people.

description.narrative: The health centres/facilities have an adequate number of thermocol boxes, syringes and other equipment to carry and administer the vaccine to people.

Due to delay in approval, the procurement not initiated. Only follow-up activities cost booked.;
